description:
If you’re new to SPDs, these multi-release cleats are a great place to start.

  • Includes screws and backer plates, just in case you need new hardware too
  • Multi-release cleats release by turning your foot either in or out, vs. just turning your foot out on a single release cleat
  • Great for riders new to SPDs and mountain bikers
  • Made from cold forged steel for improved durability
name: Shimano SM-SH56 Multi-Release Cleat Assembly with Cleat Nuts
